meta.title: Statemine
meta.description: Statemine is a generic assets parachain which provides functionality for deploying and transferring assets — both Fungible and Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs). It is a common good parachain on Kusama (not to be confused with Statemint, which is a parachain on Polkadot).

title: Statemine
description: Statemine is a generic assets parachain which provides functionality for deploying and transferring assets — both Fungible and Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs). It is a common good parachain on Kusama (not to be confused with Statemint, which is a parachain on Polkadot).
